attributes.action: add more funding for mental health services across England
attributes.additional_details: The reason i want the government or Parliament to provide more funding and support for mental health services is because during the Corona virus pandemic there is limited funding/ resources for mental health due to cut backs.  During the pandemic the number of mental health cases has gone up and there is not enough support for people who are struggling with there mental health across England. 1 in 15 people every week attempt suicide, and 4 out of 15 people have suicide thoughts.
attributes.background: I want the government or Parliament to provide more funding for mental health services across England, as there is not enough funding or support for mental health services across England.

rejection.details:
We understand you want the Government to provide additional funding for mental health services, however it's not clear which specific services this would apply to nor who would be eligible to receive this support.

You might like to sign the following petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566536
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558759
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574673
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575532
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561349

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
